column1: #Text=Jinora says : " Are you sure we should be going to Zaofu ?
#Text=She needs to know that the Avatar is back .
#Text=" Korra says : " Meelo , there 's not gon na be a fight .
#Text=She was a captain in Su 's guard ; I think she can be reasoned with .
#Text=Why did we go through all that trouble to save you if you 're not going to beat someone up ?
